features.description: Replace keytar with JSON file storage
steps: Rewrite credentials.ts to use plain JSON file
Use configPath from env-paths for storage location
Set file permissions to 0600 on write
Remove all keytar imports and encryption code
Remove keytar from package.json
Run bun install to update lockfile
Verify no keytar references remain in codebase
Remove libsecret-1-dev installation from ci.yml
Remove libsecret-1-dev from release.yml if present
Verify CI passes without system dependencies
On first run, check for old keytar credentials
If found, migrate to new JSON format
Clear old keytar storage after migration
Handle case where keytar is unavailable gracefully
Test login command stores credentials
Test logout command clears credentials
Test credentials persist across CLI invocations
Verify file permissions are 0600
Push changes to main
Verify lint-and-build job passes
Verify cross-platform-build job passes
Verify binary runs without libsecret
